Name: Bogdanoff vs. Wojak Simulator
About the game: A simple clicker game where you race against the clock to destroy as many Wojaks as possible by manipulating the markets using an intuitive UI. Features: -Retro pixel art style nuclear console view of the world -Popups of Wojak's buying and selling popular stocks such as TSLA, GME etc. -Rage sequences when destroying Wojak -Wojak reactions to your actions -2 Button flow: 1. Choose stock 2. Bompeet or Dompeet 3. Watch the Wojaks rage
